Introduction to the Tidyverse

```{r}

library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)

gapminder
```
Filter
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter (year==1957)


```

Arrange

```{r}

gapminder %>%
  arrange (lifeExp)

gapminder %>%
  arrange(desc(lifeExp))
```
filtering and arranging

```{r}

gapminder %>%
  filter (year ==1957) %>%
  arrange(desc(pop))
```

The verb mutate

```{r}

gapminder %>%
  mutate(lifeExp = 12*lifeExp)

gapminder %>%
  mutate(lifeExpMonts = 12*lifeExp)
```

Combining filter, mutate and arrange


```{r}
gapminder %>%
  filter(year==2007)%>%
  mutate(lifeExpMonts=12*lifeExp) %>%
  arrange (desc(lifeExpMonts))
```

GGPLOT2

```{r}

library(ggplot2)


gapminder_1952 <- gapminder  %>%
  filter (year==1952)

gapminder_1952

ggplot(gapminder_1952, aes(x=pop, y=gdpPercap))+
  geom_point()
```

log scaling

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder_1952, aes (x=pop, y=gdpPercap))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  scale_y_log10()


```
```{r}
gapminder_1952
ggplot(gapminder_1952, aes(x=pop, y=lifeExp))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  facet_wrap(~ continent)

```
```{r}
gapminder_1952
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x=gdpPercap, y=lifeExp))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_log10()+
  facet_wrap(~ year)

```
